section.name: How I can conctact the authors
section.p: You can contact the authors of Eoulsan by mail or using the the eoulsan group on Google group.

section.name: How can I contribute to Eoulsan?
section.p: Eoulsan is a free software project. Everybody is encouraged to contribute to Eoulsan. There are lots of ways in which you can help to continue Eoulsan:

ul.li: Submitting bug reports to the issue tracker
Programming new Eoulsan plugins and redistributing them (by yourself or in Eoulsan source repository)
Writing developer documentation on Eoulsan Wiki if you become Eoulsan committer

section.p: There are several places to look for more information if you want to get involved in the development. The first step is to subscribe to the eoulsan group. You will soon see something that can be improved or added.

section.name: How do I commit a bug report?
section.p: As Eoulsan code is hosting by Google, you can use the issue tracker bind to our project.

section.name: How do I get access to the code repository ?
section.p: The Eoulsan project uses the Git system to develop the core parts of the software. To facilitate contributions to our project, Eoulsan code is hosted by Google code hosting. You can freely access to the main page of the project and to the git repository.
